moa.streams.filters
Class AddNoiseFilter

java.lang.Object
  moa.AbstractMOAObject
      moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
          moa.streams.filters.AbstractStreamFilter
              moa.streams.filters.AddNoiseFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, MOAObject, OptionHandler, StreamFilter, InstanceStream
public class AddNoiseFilter
extends AbstractStreamFilter

Filter for adding random noise to examples in a stream. Noise can be added to attribute values or to class labels.

Version:
$Revision: 7 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
See Also:
